title: Nvidia's fiscal fourth-quarter results beat estimates  stock rises

title: UPDATE 2-Nvidia's fiscal 4th-quarter results beat estimates  stock rises

content: SAN FRANCISCO  Feb 11 Nvidia Corp on Wednesday posted higher fiscal fourth-quarter revenue that beat Wall Street's expectations as the graphics chipmaker increased its focus on high-end automobiles.
name: NVIDIA Corporation
title: Nvidia's fiscal 4th-quarter revenue beats estimates

content: Jan 4 Chipmaker Nvidia on Sunday unveiled a new processor aimed at powering high-end graphics on car dashboards as well as sophisticated auto-pilot systems.
name: NVIDIA Corporation
title: Chipmaker Nvidia accelerates move into smarter automobiles
